about.description: JS Slots Machine follows the general rules of slot games, i.e, it aims to make the symbols spin and then check if you have combinations of 3 or more equal symbols displayed at one of the 9 possible winning lines.
about.explosiveDescription: The downside of the game: A line of 3 or more Explosive symbols makes you lose credits.
about.scatterDescription: A line of 3 or more Scatter symbols offers you 10 free spins
about.wildcardDescription: WildCard symbol can take the place of any other game symbol, increasing your winning chances. At the end of each spin, there is a chance to win extra wildcards.
about.title: About

controllers.checkInfo: Click to learn more about this game.
controllers.checkSettings: Click to check and change game settings.

header.shareText: This is a link to JS Slots game
header.welcome: Let's play the nerdiest slot machine on the earth!!!

reset.clickDeclineDiscard: Click 'No' to continue the ongoing JS Slot game.
reset.clickDiscard: Click '{{buttonLabel}}' to discard the ongoing JS Slot game and start a new one.
reset.description: Allows the player to choose to start a new game or not.
reset.doNotShowAgain: Do not show this message again
reset.resetGame: You have an ongoing game. Do you want to discard it?
reset.resetGameNoCredits: You run out of credits. Start a new game?
reset.title: Reset Game
